articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets Servicemen's Families of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets Servicemen's Families of KPA
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il met and had a photo session with the members of art groups of families of service persons of KPA units who proved successful in the third round of the second-term contests among art groups of families of KPA service persons.
					 He acknowledged their enthusiastic cheers and extended a warm salute to them. 
					
					 He noted that the performances given by them strikingly demonstrated the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy on culture and arts for popularizing the arts and the admirable picture of new culture created in the era of Songun.
					
					 Highly appreciating their participation in the contests with exceptionally great enthusiasm and dynamic performances given by them before party members, servicepersons and working people, thus making a great contribution to making revolutionary spirit prevail throughout the society, he had a photograph taken with them.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that art group members and families of all other servicepersons would as ever give fuller play to ardent patriotism and the revolutionary soldier spirit and thus safeguard the defence lines of the socialist country as firm as an iron wall, standing alongside their husbands in the same trench.
					
					 Also present there were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first deputy director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General U Tong Chuk, member of the NDC of the DPRK, Ju Sang Song, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of People's Security, and other commanding officers of the KPA and armed forces organs.

articles.title: CPRK Blasts US and S. Korea's Extension of OPCON
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts US and S. Korea's Extension of OPCON
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak during his recent trip to Canada begged Obama to extend the "transfer of the wartime operation control (OPCON)" till 2015 while talking about changed "security" environment and the latter agreed on the proposed extension. 
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement released Thursday vehemently denounced this agreement, a product of sordid collusion and tie-up between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group, as a very serious provocation driving the present dangerous situation to a more extreme phase and revealing their intention not to rule out even an all-out war with the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 No sooner had he come to power than traitor Lee Myung Bak ran the whole gamut of tricks to renege on the promise of the preceding "government" to receive the "wartime operation control" from the U.S. by 2012, blustering that it was "a wrong option" and premature. He persistently asked his American master to extend OPCON under the pretext of the warship case, finally getting it postponed.
					
					 The criminal nexus between the U.S. and the puppet group of south Korea fully discloses the true colors of the puppet group as sycophants and traitors serving the U.S. as it prolongs its remaining days at the sacrifice of the dignity and interests of the nation, kowtowing to Washington.
					
					 The true nature of the warship sinking case cooked up by traitor Lee together with the U.S. was also brought to daylight.
					
					 The stark facts irrefutably prove that the warship case was a hideous charade orchestrated by the U.S. to shun Japan's demand for the transfer of the Futenma U.S. military base and meet the south Korean puppet group's request for the extension of OPCON.
					
					 The extension of OPCON put south Korea in such a miserable position that it is left with no option but to comply with the U.S. demands for the opening of south Korean markets, increasing of the share of upkeep for the U.S. forces, dispatch of more troops overseas, involvement in the building of a missile shield, etc.
					
					 The puppet group is deprived of even military sovereignty, totally dependent on the U.S. politically and economically. 
					
					 It is a political caricature provoking world people's laughter for the group to go busy with diplomacy, talking about "an advanced state" and "national status."

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Burundian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Burundian President
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Pierre Nkurunziza, president of Burundi, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished for peace, stability, development and prosperity of friendly Burundi, expressing belief that the longstanding relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Media Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Media Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television of China headed by Vice Minister Tian Jin at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift Chinese Media Delegation
articles.content:
Gift Chinese Media Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television of China headed by Vice Minister Tian Jin on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by the vice minister on Thursday.

articles.title: Performances Given by Servicemen's Families
articles.content:
Performances Given by Servicemen's Families
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Performances of art groups of servicemen's families, which participated in the third round of the second-term contest among art groups of servicemen's families of the Korean People's Army, were given in Pyongyang, drawing capacity audiences.
					 Appreciating the performances given at the People's Palace of Culture and the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on June 28 and 30 were senior army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and power bodies, ministries and national institutions and others.
					
					 Put on their stages were such colorful numbers as quartet "His Eternal Smile", poem recital "Long Journey of Great Devotion", narration and song "Our Hearts Follow the General", solo "I Am Wife of Officer", sketch "Our Hearts Are on the Front" and chorus "So Long As We Are with the General".
					
					 The performers well represented the iron faith and will of the servicemen's families to devotedly defend Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il together with their husbands tightly holding arms of Songun.
					
					 Included in the repertoire were numbers that vividly depicted in a profound philosophical way the struggle and life of the servicemen's families in the era of Songun.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Sinuiju
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Sinuiju
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) --The performance of light comedy "Echo of Mountain", Kim Il Sung Prize Laureate, began in Sinuiju, North Phyongan Province on Wednesday.
					 Among the audience were officials of the party and power organs, people from all walks of life, youth and students of the province.
					
					 The performance mesmerized the audience for truthfully representing the ideological and moral world of the people in the era of Chollima.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Russian Dance Company Performs in Sariwon
articles.content:
Russian Dance Company Performs in Sariwon
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia gave a performance at the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre on Thursday.
					 Appreciating the performance were officials of the party and power bodies, creators, artistes, teachers and researchers in the field of culture and arts and working people in the province.
					
					 The dance company presented traditional folk dances loved by the Russian people and dances of nations of different countries.
					
					 Artistes of the dance company vividly represented the spirit of patriotism of the Russian people and their feelings in "Guerrillas" and other numbers reflecting the struggle of the Soviet people who bravely fought against aggressors in the occupied regions during the Great Patriotic War.

articles.title: Chilgol Folk Restaurant
articles.content:
Chilgol Folk Restaurant
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- There are many restaurants specializing in national dishes in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Chilgol Folk Restaurant is one of them.
					
					 The two-storied restaurant has a 150-seat dining hall, a souvenir stand, a wedding hall, etc.
					
					 It serves rice-cake soup, cold noodle, boiled rice mixed with subsidiary articles of diet, mung-bean pancake, makkoli (crude liquor) and other seasonal dishes and produces bean curd, fermented soybean sauce and other foodstuffs for citizens.
					
					 Tara vine fruit, wild grape and other wild fruits, and dishes made of leopard plant, bracken and other edible herbs are also served at the restaurant.
					
					 Most popular among the dishes of the restaurant are boiled rice with beanpaste soup and ssukttok (rice cake seasoned with wormwood).  There are nearly ten kinds of ssukttok, including steamed rice cake, glutinous rice-cake, half-moon-shaped rice-cake and bell-shaped rice-cake.
					
					 The national dishes presented by the restaurant were highly appreciated at the 14th and 15th April Holiday Food Festivals held last year and this year. 
					
					 Cha Song Chil, 66, a resident in Mangyongdae District, told KCNA that boiled rice with beanpaste soup served by the restaurant was one of his favorite dishes as it was very tasty and good for health.
					
					 Han Yong Suk, 62, manager of the restaurant, said that she would try to make the restaurant serve more and better national dishes to gain greater popularity among citizens.
					
					 The restaurant is situated in Chilgol-dong No. 3, Mangyongdae District.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Danger of US Asia-Pacific Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Danger of US Asia-Pacific Policy
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now zealously pushing forward its moves to carry out its Asia strategy for aggression, attaching particular importance to the Asian-Pacific region.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article, citing data.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific policy of the U.S. is, in essence, a strategy for aggression and intervention aimed to satisfy its unlimited greed and wild ambition to dominate this region, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 Asia-Pacific is the focus of the U.S. imperialists' global strategy of strength. 
					
					 Their Asia-Pacific policy is the core and mainstay of their strategy for world domination in the 21st century. 
					
					 They attach great importance to the Korean Peninsula in carrying out the above-said strategy. 
					
					 It is their strategic calculation that only when the peninsula is put under their control can they contain anti-imperialist and independent countries and dominate the world with ease.
					
					 Their Asia-Pacific policy reflects their wild ambition to establish economic domination over the region and monopolize the resources there. 
					
					 They seek to gain the right to monopolize the strategic resources and establish economic domination over the Asia-Pacific region by means of war to grab resources and thus conquer Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Their Asia-Pacific policy is fraught with great danger for its aggressive and reactionary nature, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The danger lies above all in the fact that the policy brings a new arms race and Cold War.
					
					 By deliberately stepping up the moves for an arms race and Cold War the U.S. seeks to secure a pretext for aggression and intervention and expand its sphere of domination worldwide. 
					
					 The danger of the above-said policy also lies in that it serves the purpose of forming a structure of acute military confrontation. 
					
					 In case a reactionary military bloc with the U.S. as its axis is framed up and made operational in Asia-Pacific, this will put into shape a structure of military confrontation equal to that of the era of the Cold War and even more dangerous.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists seek to invade the DPRK, a fortress of socialism, by force of arms and, by using it as a breakthrough, provoke a war to conquer Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Their strategy for a war against the DPRK precisely means a strategy for a nuclear war.
					
					 Northeast Asia, the Korean Peninsula in particular, is the region fraught with the greatest danger of a nuclear war at present.
					
					 As the U.S. imperialists consider the DPRK as the target of their nuclear strike, no one can predict at what moment a nuclear war will break out on the peninsula. 
					
					 If they keep pursuing the Asia-Pacific policy, it will render the situation more serious and armed clash and war will be unavoidable.

articles.title: S. Korea's Suppression of Solidarity for Progress Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Suppression of Solidarity for Progress Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group kicked off a campaign for cracking down upon the Solidarity for Progress on Tuesday.
					 That day the puppet Intelligence Service backed by two companies of policemen searched the offices and houses of leading members of the organization and offices of the council for supporting the organization before arresting Han Chung Mok, co-representative of the organization, Choe Yong Ok, vice-chairperson of the Committee for Independent Reunification, and Jong Tae Yon, former chairperson of the Policy Committee.
					
					 The fascist maniacs took such action against them on charges of violating the provisions of "meeting and communication" and "reception of directives" of the "National Security Law," taking issue with a working-level contact held by the organization with the north through the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Sycophancy towards US under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Sycophancy towards US under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and public organizations including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Solidarity for Progress at a press conference in Seoul on June 25 denounced traitor Lee Myung Bak for his pro-U.S. sycophantic action to extend the "transfer of wartime operation control"(OPCON).
					 At the press conference the organizations accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of making desperate efforts to extend OPCON, while pursuing a hardline policy towards the DPRK under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case.
					
					 This is nothing but a very disgraceful and hateful action as it once again clearly proves that Lee is depending on the U.S. in every matter, they deplored.
					
					 They noted with concern that if the U.S. is allowed to keep reining in the strategy and operation of the south Korean army and leading the anti-DPRK military operations as now, the process for achieving peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula will be further delayed. They demanded Lee Myung Bak step down.
					
					 They urged Lee Myung Bak to opt for properly dealing with the issue of OPCON, though belatedly.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak should bear in mind that if he defies the demand of the people, he will be responsible for the stain left on history, they warned, calling upon all the people to hold in check the above-said action of the Lee's forces come what may.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind "Cheonan" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind "Cheonan" Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The "Joint Action for Probing the Truth about 'Cheonan' Case and Peace of the Korean Peninsula" grouping more than 40 civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the "National Assembly" in Seoul on June 28 demanding the puppet National Assembly make an "inspection of the state administration" for probing the truth behind the case.
					 A press release was read out there.
					
					 It accused the "Grand National Party" of railroading on June 23 "a resolution critical of the north" over the "Cheonan case" through "the Defense Committee of the NA" without putting it on vote.
					
					 The press release expressed irrepressible resentment at the GNP which disabled the "NA ad hoc committee for probing the truth behind the case of warship 'Cheonan'" at a time when there are increasing doubts about the "results of the investigation" into the case and is getting frantic with taking "military counter-measures" that would spark off a war.
					
					 The truth behind the case has not been probed yet, it said, urging the NA to make an "inspection of the state administration" for properly probing the truth behind the case.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of "Comfort Women" for Japanese Army Urged
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of "Comfort Women" for Japanese Army Urged
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Washington Regional Committee for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps of the United States held a general meeting on June 11 stressing the need to settle the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The committee at the meeting recalled that a plenary session of the U.S. House of Representatives passed a resolution urging the Japanese government to make a formal apology for Japan's past sexual slavery, but it has not opted for settling the issue, evading its responsibility for it. 
					
					 The committee pointed out that it would launch a positive movement to find a solution to the above-said issue in the future.
					
					 To this end, the committee will conduct activities in solidarity with the signature campaign of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps in south Korea urging Japan to apologize and pay reparation for its sexual slavery, the committee said.
					
					 It stressed that the U.S. government should urge Japan to accept at once the resolution on the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Indian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Indian
Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Harising Khang, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), issued a statement on June 19 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement stressed that Kim Jong Il strengthened the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung into an organizational and ideological crystal system based on one centre and single idea and will and into a party with its roots struck deep into the popular masses.
					
					 It is the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK is now demonstrating its might even under the complicated international situation, it noted, adding:
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK is leading to victory the struggle of the Korean people to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, holding high the banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Cause of Korean People Supported by Finnish
articles.content:
Cause of Korean People Supported by Finnish
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, issued a statement on June 22 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The statement noted that the U.S. could not bring down the young DPRK at all in the Korean War but kneel down before the Korean people to sign the Armistice Agreement at last on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The armistice temporarily brought peace to the Korean Peninsula but the danger of a war has not yet vanished, it said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. has introduced even nuclear weapons into south Korea, increasing the danger of a nuclear war in the peninsula with each passing day.
					
					 The Korean people's struggle for national reunification which had been favorably developing is confronted with the grave challenge due to the anti-reunification moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group. The present U.S. administration has not yet rolled back its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to stifle the DPRK at any cost because the latter is located in a position of geopolitical importance and is building socialism.
					
					 The statement strongly demanded that the U.S. withdraw at once its forces out of south Korea and unconditionally respond to the proposal of the DPRK for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 It extended full support to the Korean people in the just cause of achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Marked
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day Marked
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Lectures, meetings, seminars and film shows took place in Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Uganda and Nigeria between June 16 and 18 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their undying exploits and books introducing the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan in a lecture said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK was an event of great historic significance in the development of the Party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il achieved the unity in thinking and purpose of the Party based on the idea of the leader, thus further strengthening the WPK into an invincible party, he said.
					
					 The secretary of the Sogd Regional Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said at a meeting that a new turn was made in the development of the WPK and the Korean revolution with the start of Kim Jong Il's work at its Central Committee.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of Songun Politics of Kampala Kololo Higher Middle School stressed at a seminar that Kim Jong Il has developed in depth the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and frustrated the imperialists' every challenge and scheme to stifle the DPRK with his Songun politics, thus dynamically advancing the cause of Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Early in June Juche 68 (1979), President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province.
					 After acquainting himself with rice-transplantation, he said with anxiety that in recent days when he had stayed in the province, it was sunny in only one or two days and cloudy with low temperatures in all other days.
					
					 He then asked an official of the farm how the rice fields had been irrigated.
					
					 The official answered that they had been watered often as rice-transplanting had been just finished and rain had not come on.
					
					The President told him that it would not be good to water rice field often in cold weather and that water should be kept on rice fields for some days to raise the water temperature.
					
					 The method was suitable to the farms in the area.
					
					 The President also taught the officials of the farm another irrigation method -- keeping water on rice fields until they become fully wet and soft. 
					
					 The officials, who had been worried about the management of rice field irrigation, admired his profound knowledge of farming.

articles.title: CRPP critica la posposicion de traspaso del "mando"
articles.content:
CRPP critica la posposicion de traspaso del "mando"
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ATCC) -- En su reciente visita a Canada, el traidor Lee Myung Bak suplico a Obama que pospusiera hasta el ano 2015 la transferencia del "mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra" pretextando el supuesto cambio de las circunstancias de "seguridad", y consiguio acordarlo con el. 
					Este acuerdo, producto de la sucia confabulacion entre Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos, constituye la provocacion muy grave para llevar a la peor fase la ya peligrosa situacion actual y desatar sin reparacion alguna hasta la guerra total contra la RPDC.
					
					Condena asi el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) en su declaracion fechada 1 y continua: 
					
					Tan pronto como llegara al Poder, el traidor Lee Myung Bak se valio de todas las maranas para revocar la decision del "poder" antecesor de recibir hasta 2012 de EE.UU. el "mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra" calificandola de "opcion erronea" y prematura.
					
					Aprovechando el hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan", suplico obstinadamente a su amo gringo que dilatara la transferencia del mando y lo alcanzo por fin en su visita a Canada.
					
					La confabulacion criminal EE.UU.-Sur de Corea vista esta vez sirve para demostrar una vez mas la naturaleza de los vendepatrias titeres surcoreanos que sirven a EE.UU. como si fuera su abuelo y viven vendiendole la dignidad y los intereses nacionales.
					
					Igualmente, quedo revelado claramente que el traidor Lee Myung Bak fabrico junto con EE.UU. el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					
					Los hechos irrefutables comprueban que tal incidente fue un complot supergrande de EE.UU. para hacer a Japon y a los titeres surcoreanos que cancele la demanda sobre el traslado de la base de las tropas norteamericanas de Futenma y le pidan la dilacion de la transferencia de dicho mando, respectivamente.
					
					Al precio de la prorroga de traspaso del mando, el miserable Sur de Corea no tendra otro remedio que aceptar todas las demandas de EE.UU. como la apertura del mercado, la reparticion de los gastos para el mantenimiento de las tropas norteamericanas, el envio de efectivos surcoreanos a ultramar y la incorporacion en el sistema antimisiles, etc.
					
					Aunque estan totalmente subyugados a EE.UU. en los planos politico y economico y perdieron hasta la soberania militar, los titeres surcoreanos andan hablando del "Estado avanzado", lo cual es una caricatura politica que causa la risotada del mundo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe regalo de delegacion china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe regalo de delegacion china
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara la delegacion de la Administracion Estatal de Radio, Film y Television de China presidida por el viceministro Tian Jin, de visita en Corea.
					 El jefe de la delegacion lo entrego este jueves al vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop.

articles.title: Conjunto de danza Moiseyev ofrece funcion en Sariwon
articles.content:
Conjunto de danza Moiseyev ofrece funcion en Sariwon
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ATCC) -- El Conjunto de Danza Folclorica Academica Nacional Igor Moiseyev de Rusia ofrecio este jueves una funcion en el Teatro de Arte de la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte en la ciudad de Sariwon.
					Disfrutaron el espectaculo los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el Poder, los creadores, artistas, profesores e investigadores de la rama de cultura y arte, asi como trabajadores de esa provincia.
					
					Los artistas coronaron la escena con los tradicionales bailes folcloricos del pueblo ruso y de otras naciones. 
					
					A traves de "Guerrilleros" y otros programas que describen la valiente lucha del pueblo sovietico contra los invasores en las zonas ocupadas durante la Gran Guerra Patria, los ejecutantes mostraron bien el espiritu patriotico y sentimientos del pueblo ruso.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica politica de EE.UU. sobre Asia y Pacifico
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica politica de EE.UU. sobre Asia y Pacifico
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ATCC) -- En su articulo individual difundido este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo citando datos que hoy dia, Estados Unidos implementa activamente su agresiva estrategia a Asia considerando a Asia-Pacifico como la region mas importante del mundo.
					La politica de EE.UU. sobre Asia-Pacifico es, en su esencia, la de agresion e intervencion para saciar su ilimitada codicia y realizar su ambicion dominacionista en esta region, senala el articulista y continua:
					
					Ademas, constituye el nucleo de la estrategia norteamericana del siglo 21 encaminada a conquistar el mundo con las fuerzas.
					
					Para cumplir esta estrategia, el imperio concede capital importancia a la Peninsula Coreana porque si la toma, le resultara facil doblegar a los paises independientes y antiimperialistas y conquistar luego el mundo entero.
					
					En la politica de EE.UU. sobre Asia-Pacifico esta reflejada la ambicion de este imperio de establecer a traves de la guerra por recursos naturales el control monopolico de recursos estrategicos regionales y el dominio economico de la region y de conquistar a base de ello a Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Tal politica norteamericana resulta agresiva, reaccionaria y muy peligrosa.
					
					En primer lugar, esta buscando la nueva carrera armamentista y la nueva guerra fria, con las cuales el imperio trata de procurar el pretexto de agresion e intervencion y extender sus garras de dominacion a todo el mundo.
					
					En segundo lugar, promueve la creacion de la estructura de agudo enfrentamiento militar.
					
					Si se forma en esa region un bloque militar reaccionario centrado en EE.UU. y comienza a funcionar, se dara una estructura de enfrentamiento militar igual o mas aguda que la establecida durante la guerra fria.
					
					EE.UU. intenta agredir con las fuerzas armadas a la RPDC, baluarte del socialismo, y desatar la guerra de conquista de Asia y el resto del mundo tomandola como trampolin.
					
					La estrategia de la guerra anti-RPDC que persigue EE.UU. es la de guerra nuclear.
					
					En realidad, la region que sufre el riesgo mas grande de guerra nuclear es el Nordeste Asiatico, en particular, la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Puesto que los imperialistas norteamericanos colocaron a la RPDC en la mirilla de sus armas nucleares, nadie sabe cuando se desatara la guerra nuclear.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue practicando su politica a Asia-Pacifico, se tornara cada vez mas grave la situacion y no se podra evitar el conflicto armado ni la guerra.
